author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
Become a living weapon. As he searches for answers about his past, Wolverine will do whatever it takes – unleashing brutal claw combat, violent rage, and relentless determination – to cut through the mystery of the man he used to be. 

From Insomniac Games, the developers of the critically acclaimed Marvel’s Spider-Man franchise, comes Marvel’s Wolverine, an all-new take on an iconic character based on Marvel Comics. Developed in collaboration with Marvel Games and Sony Interactive Entertainment, Marvel’s Wolverine coming to PlayStation®5 consoles Fall 2026.

Descriptive Audio version available.

© 2025 MARVEL 
© 2025 Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc. 
Developed by Insomniac Games, Inc.

#WolverinePS5

title: The Avengers are... Zombies?!

author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
This week, writer Zeb Wells and Director Bryan Andrews discuss Marvel Animation’s Marvel Zombies. Then, we’ll dig into the comic book history of Ms. Marvel. All time codes are approximate.

00:00 - Welcome Back!
1:09 - Writer Zeb Wells and Director Bryan Andrews discuss Marvel Animation’s Marvel Zombies
12:47 - Comic book history of Ms. Marvel

title: Marvel Zombies Director Bryan Andrews on Marvel Animation's First TV-MA Show

author: Marvel Entertainment
description:

Stream #MarvelZombies, a Marvel Animation four-part event arriving tomorrow only on @DisneyPlus.
